TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . NORP She brought civil proceedings against her local authority requesting arrears of child benefits due to her .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Zheleznodorozhny ORG of GPE granted her claims and awarded her the arrears in the amount of MONEY ( RUR ) . The judgment was not appealed against and became final on DATE .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date a writ of execution was issued .

CARDINAL . As the judgment remained unexecuted , on an unspecified date the applicant forwarded the writ to the debtor 's bank and requested it to debit the sum due from the debtor 's account , but the bank refused .
CARDINAL . She then brought proceedings against the bank claiming damages for its refusal to enforce the judgment of DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Justice of the Peace of ORG of GPE dismissed the applicant 's claims on the ground that the bank had not been at fault in refusing to enforce the judgment of DATE . On appeal , the judgment was upheld by ORG of GPE on DATE .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant received ORG in execution of the judgment of the Zheleznodorozhny ORG of GPE of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE she received the outstanding balance of ORG MONEY , thus completing full execution of the judgment .
